summary: After a meteor shower strikes Los Angeles, toxic smoke is released across the city causing people to physically change and become violent. A small group of survivors plans to vacate the city by heading to the coast.
cast: Justin Ray|Jerod Meagher|Stefanie Estes|Ron Hanks|Michael Taber|Dennis Leech|Ali Williams|Morgan Jackson|Kendall Mayhew|Jeff Locker|Tansy Alexander|Francisco Froes|Tasha Dixon|Michael J. Sielaff|Jonathan Belda|Terri Czapleski|Stephen Savage|John Will Clay|Adam Paxton|Garrett Bales|Dean Shull
title: Apocalypse L.A.
